content:
IContentKey IContentKey Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Represents a content key that can be used for encryption and decryption.

Edit
